summary: This script loads a RAM disk using loadram.sh, then launches QEMU emulator with KVM enabled and memory limits set for an i386 system, booting from the specified disk image "c.hd".

details.comment: This script loads a RAM disk using loadram.sh, then launches QEMU emulator with KVM enabled and memory limits set for an i386 system, booting from the specified disk image "c.hd".
